items.title: Kvitekrist
items.description: This book is about the life of Olav Haraldson, also known as Olav the Holy. This book offers a glimpse into how the Viking Age was. Mostly, it shows the strife and warfare that shaped history and how the impressions of the writers shape the historical narrative.

items.title: Literature
items.description: This section is about the fine arts of literature and how I relate to them. I will use this section mostly as a way for me to relate to the great works.
